channel.title: frankm tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from frankm.

item.description: I received the Google Pixelbuds yesterday as promised by USPS and so far I am very happy with how they work. They were discovered by my Pixel 4a and setup went smoothly. The Pixelbuds are associated to my Google account and so my work phone that runs ... https://t.co/SUAq1Q9xNm
item.source:markdown: I received the Google Pixelbuds yesterday as promised by USPS and so far I am very happy with how they work. They were discovered by my Pixel 4a and setup went smoothly. The Pixelbuds are associated to my Google account and so my work phone that runs ... https://t.co/SUAq1Q9xNm
